title: Find your Diet
desc: Find a diet that fits your lifestyle: Calorie Counting, Low-Carb, Keto, Vegan, Vegetarian and more.

title: Set Your Targets
desc: Choose your desired weekly weight loss rate, target date, and source of calories like fat, carbs, and proteins.

title: Log Your Meals & Exercise
desc: Use the App to track your food, physical activities, and nutrients. Use the barcode scanner. Log ahead of time for better planning and scheduling.

title: Reach Your Goals
desc: Monitor your daily progress, check your weight loss forecast, and receive ongoing advice and feedback. Learn more about nutrients in your diet and make better choices.
